      • addDocAttachment

        java.lang.String addDocAttachment(java.lang.String unid,
                                java.lang.String fileName,
                                java.lang.Boolean isInlineImage)
        Adds an on-disk file to the internal ArrayList of EmailAttachment objects, generating and returning a unique identifier for the attachment
        Parameters:
        unid - of document from which to retrieve the attachment
        fileName - of the attachment
        isInlineImage - whether attachment is to be inserted as an inline image
        Returns:
        String "cid:" + contentId;

      • addDocAttachment

        java.lang.String addDocAttachment(java.lang.String unid,
                                java.lang.String fileName,
                                java.lang.Boolean isInlineImage,
                                java.lang.String contentId)
        Adds an attachment from a Document to the internal ArrayList of EmailAttachment objects, using a passed string as the unique identifier for the attachment
        Parameters:
        unid - of document from which to retrieve the attachment
        fileName - of the attachment
        isInlineImage - whether attachment is to be inserted as an inline image
        contentId - a unique reference for each attachment to be inserted into the email
        Returns:
        String "cid:" + contentId;

      • addFileAttachment

        java.lang.String addFileAttachment(java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.String fileName,
                                 java.lang.Boolean isInlineImage)
        Adds an on-disk file to the internal ArrayList of EmailAttachment objects, generating and returning a unique identifier for the attachment
        Parameters:
        path - of the on-disk file
        fileName - of the file
        isInlineImage - whether attachment is to be inserted as an inline image
        Returns:
        String "cid:" + contentId;

      • addFileAttachment

        java.lang.String addFileAttachment(java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.String fileName,
                                 java.lang.Boolean isInlineImage,
                                 java.lang.String contentId)
        Adds an on-disk file to the internal ArrayList of EmailAttachment objects, using a passed string as the unique identifier for the attachment
        Parameters:
        path - of the on-disk file
        fileName - of the file
        isInlineImage - whether attachment is to be inserted as an inline image
        contentId - a unique reference for each attachment to be inserted into the email
        Returns:
        String "cid:" + contentId;
